title: #9 The Halloween Episode!
itunes:title: #9 The Halloween Episode!
itunes:subtitle: Danny's first Halloween special is about all things Halloween. His guest is Aaron Wallace, author of the book Hocus Pocus in Focus. Aaron literally wrote the book on the iconic Bette Midler film, and he has so much insight into the classic movie t...
description:
Danny's first Halloween special is about all things Halloween. His guest is Aaron Wallace, author of the book Hocus Pocus in Focus. Aaron literally wrote the book on the iconic Bette Midler film, and he has so much insight into the classic movie that he shares with us. 

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
